fi.jumi.actors
Class ActorRef<T>

java.lang.Object
  fi.jumi.actors.ActorRef<T>

@ThreadSafe
public class ActorRef<T>
extends Object

Handle for communicating with an actor.

          Used for sending asynchronous messages to an actor.

Method Detail

wrap

public static <T> ActorRef<T> wrap(T proxy)
Can be used to wrap test doubles into ActorRefs for unit testing purposes.

Warning: Never use this method in production code! This method is meant to be used only by the Actors class.

tell

public T tell()
Used for sending asynchronous messages to an actor. The recommended usage pattern is actorRef.tell().theMessage(theParameters)

To avoid confusion, the proxy returned from this method should never be stored in a variable or passed as a parameter to a method. Otherwise it can be hard to know that when you are holding the real actor object and when a proxy to it.
